CommandManual.description: This manual page documents the GNU version of df. df displays the amount of disk space available on the file system containing each file name argu‐ ment. If no file name is given, the space available on all currently mounted file systems is shown. Disk space is shown in 1K blocks by default, un‐ less the environment variable POSIXLY_CORRECT is set, in which case 512-byte blocks are used.
CommandManual.example_output: Filesystem 1K-blocks Used Available Use% Mounted on tmpfs 400052 1576 398476 1% /run /dev/sda3 30267332 20945476 7759028 73% / tmpfs 2000240 23404 1976836 2% /dev/shm tmpfs 5120 4 5116 1% /run/lock /dev/sda2 524252 6220 518032 2% /boot/efi tmpfs 400048 136 399912 1% /run/user/1000
